page.title: 20Credits.
page.content: {Teachers:_}Tom McCutcheon, Eilidth Morris, Nan Campbell, Nigel Horsley, Pat McCall. {Pupils:_}Gail O'Hara,David Neill, Angela Mitchell, Derek Hay, Alan Dunlop, David Rowan, Michelle Dunn, Nicola Torbet, Helen Mutch. {Others:_}Gibson MacDonald.
